amendment.description: Amendment exempts the publicly owned treatment works serving the city of Anchorage, Alaska from the provisions of the Clean Water Act which require treatment works to be able to remove at least 30 percent of biological oxygen demanding material in the water treated.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to exempt the publicly owned treatment works serving the city of Anchorage, Alaska from the provisions of the Clean Water Act which require treatment works to be able to remove at least 30% of biological oxygen demanding material in the water treated.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
